info.author: Zerrphix Project
info.description:
ZERRPHIX
========

Zerrphix is an application for the HDI DUNE media players written in
python.

The major difference between Zerrphix and other HDI Dune indexer and
skinners is that it uses the dune_http functionality. This allows a more
feature rich experiance and no more exporting when


Features:

- Realtime menu structure generation
- Fully automated once configured
- Highly customisable menu structure/templates
- Multi user support
- Template per user support
- Auto record watched
- Continue and play next for TV Shows
- Favourites for Film and TV
- Each user can have thier own language set

Install Guide
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SXcNiFSxuZPI2cABDHOrdCOsF-_8BEgjLonA2R31ZOM/edit?usp=sharing

User Guide
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1B-R4R3x74G0xGZjDC0SjLlXQ0rggPLNrX7Hgy86Htjk/edit?usp=sharing

info.summary: zerrphix is a program for HDI DUNE network media players that can utalise the dune_http:// functionality
